attributes.action: A demand for a third EU referendum should a second referendum be granted.
attributes.additional_details:
We now face the proposition of the predominantly ‘remain’ parliament, biased British media and high powered pro EU businessmen – who have consistently twisted and manipulated information and due processes to suit their agenda attaining a second referendum with a view to overturn the first vote.
Our Disgust, anger and feelings of betrayal should be noted by means of this petition in that should a second referendum be granted and a ‘Remain’ majority be reached: We demand a 'Third Referendum'.
attributes.background: Three years after the ground breaking vote in which Leave triumphed over Remain by a margin of four points thereby instructing the government to remove the UK from the EU; We are still in, and now look to be subject to the threat of a second referendum in order to overturn it.

rejection.details:
We can't accept your petition because we aren't sure what action you would like the UK Government or Parliament to take.

The Government has said it doesn't intend to hold a second referendum. We therefore aren't sure whether you would like it to hold a second referendum and then a third or not.

You might want to sign this petition instead:

https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/257347
